Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $13,500. This represents an outstanding value considering the product's true worth of $15,000 to you. We are confident that you will find this offer irresistible. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed with the purchase, please let us know immediately. We look forward to serving you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $13,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $13,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
